text: @CapehartJ And ya'll called for Clarence Thomas to be crucified so your "gotchas" have a lot less sting.

@SethDillon Stop complaining that one of your 2 jokes got banned. You have 3 jokes; the 2 usual ones and the 3rd, about 🐝 having only 2 jokes. Now you ACTUALLY only have 2 jokes but the joke about having 2 jokes doesn't work anymore because you have 2 instead of 3. I think?
@VinslaveR @USEmbassyKyiv Nice deflection.
The last time I tried @TMobile, it was a disaster. I'm willing to try again...but really? Why do phone plans at all providers cost more than a home internet plan??? I'm talking to you, too, @Verizon

@atrupar I would have zero issue with this woman if the primary reason she was chosen wasn't her race and gender. Anyone who is chosen for anything based on race/gender is involved in racism and sexism, no matter who you are, unless you want to say she can't qualify on her own merits.
@SamsungSupport Your team was able to very quickly help me find what I was looking for. Thanks, ya'll!
@USEmbassyKyiv Let's just hope they can deflect more Russian advances with all of our intercontinental ballistic thoughts and prayers.
@SamsungSupport I was told to email a reply to one of your agents once I got my new phone so I could set up Samsung Care subscription. I never got a response. What should I do?

@OpusVI1 @RusEmbUSA @mfa_russia @USApoRusski @DeputySecState @StateDept @jrpsaki @WSJ @nytimes @WashTimes @cnnbrk @ShaolinTom Yeah, that's their point. They are only using their high-precision weapons on military targets. Everything else is fair game for their less precise weaponry. If they are targeting civilians, why do they care about precision? It'll hit something.

@TorGuard Okay but you guys didn't actually state why in your article, just that you were going to and you're still committed to privacy. My chief question is simple: are you blocking all P2P traffic in the United States? If so, I will need to look elsewhere. P2P is not illegal.
@SamsungSupport Thanks! They were able to help me!

@SamsungSupport @SamsungMobileUS Am I able to add Samsung Care to my order after placing it if I haven't gotten the order yet? I thought I was gonna be able to add it to @StateFarm but they said no. :(

@VerizonSupport I already tried that. Your response was to say something akin to "oh that's not okay! in the meantime, do you want to buy something from us?" instead of actually focus on your rude employee. It is what it is, Verizon. Be happy that your subsidiary gets my money.
@youdoyoumusic @Verizon Always nice to see the exception to the rule of poor customer service. Meanwhile, I got called stupid by my last Verizon agent. Why? Because I had questions about a promotion.

@SamsungSupport I'm not asking you to speculate, I'm only asking how many years of updates Samsung is providing for their phones. Someone told me 4 years of OS updates and 5 of security updates, but I need to be sure.
@SamsungSupport Help me decide what phone I'm getting...what are the latest Android versions that S21 FE 5G and the S22 Ultra will be receiving, and how long will they receive security updates until?

@SteveDaines #StandWithUkraine while you potentially give enemies his location by sharing a screenshot of the zoom call after he asked you specifically not to. You should be recalled immediately. This is disgusting.
